PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-07082012-05-31,  ,  ,  CIC, 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment, effective August 15, 2012, of GEORGE WANG of Scarborough, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour until March 31, 2013 or until the day prior to the coming into force of the Balanced Refugee Reform Act, whichever is earlier.
